name: Just Get 10 - Puzzle
description:
Number jigsaw. Easy to start, but it's hard to get 10. Addictive ! Brain teaser!

Just Get 10 is a fun number puzzle game that easy to play but difficult to master. Find the same numbers, tap and grow. The numbers have to be connected. Challenge yourself to see if you can get to 10. Share your high score with friends. Nothing to purchase ever, just free endless game.

The new incredible puzzle game with numbers! Another game from series "easy to play but can drive geniuses crazy!
Love number games? Here come the beautiful number puzzle game for you.
Just like the popular tile game of 2048, 1024 and threes!!!
Just Get ten is one of the addictive game and easy to play for everyone.
Just Get 10 is the most addictive game of all, It's easy to play for everyone, however it could also drive genius crazy. Find the same number in colorful tiles and combine them to grow up.

Easy to play:
Click the tiles with same number, and they will pop up. Click again to merge them together. Enjoy it and try to get 10!

Main features:
- Brain teaser.
- Endless game while you are smart enough and lucky.
- Fancy, simple and beautiful design.
- Sweet music and audio.
- Share your score and colorful number panel with your friends.
- Endless challenge.
- Easy to play, hard to master.
- Tablets supported.
- But higher scores could be achieved with experience only.
- Just Get 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 and more.
- free, ad supported.
- relaxing puzzle game.
- Anyone can play.
- Straightforward rules.
- Very addictive.
- Free and universal.

Happy playing Just Get 10
If you love Just Get Ten please give a moment to rate it.
Please feel free to give suggestion, opinion, in the review section!
Thank you
